meanings.definition: The group of employees who serve customers in a restaurant or other establishment.
meanings.sent1: The waitstaffs at the diner were friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The manager hired new waitstaffs to handle the busy weekend shifts.
meanings.sent3: The waitstaffs decided to have a race to see who could serve the most tables in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The waitstaffs were like a well-oiled machine, seamlessly attending to every customer's needs.
meanings.sent5: The waitstaffs' teamwork and coordination impressed the restaurant patrons.

meanings.definition: The act of serving customers in a restaurant or other establishment.
meanings.sent1: Good waitstaffs make dining out a pleasant experience for customers.
meanings.sent2: Training for waitstaffs includes learning how to take orders and handle payments.
meanings.sent3: The waitstaffs performed a synchronized dance routine while serving dessert to the customers.
meanings.sent4: The waitstaffs' dedication to their job was evident in their attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The waitstaffs' smiles and friendly demeanor enhanced the overall dining atmosphere.
